title: Mcrmb充值点券不加
author: Thestorm—bfy
txt_content:
[10:52:54] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 112/INFO]: [MCRMB] 加款扣款接口： 为玩家 rainlong 扣款1点券, 原因: 转入PP, 处理结果: API接口扣款操作成功
[10:52:54] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 112/WARN]: [Mcrmb] Plugin Mcrmb v2.0b15 generated an exception while executing task 60114
java.lang.IllegalStateException: PlayerPointsChangeEvent cannot be triggered asynchronously from another thread.
        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.callEvent(SimplePluginManager.java:511) ~[Spigot-1.14.4.jar:git-Spigot-cbd1a1b-009d8af]
        at org.black_ixx.playerpoints.PlayerPointsAPI.give(PlayerPointsAPI.java:41) ~[?:?]
        at org.black_ixx.playerpoints.PlayerPointsAPI.give(PlayerPointsAPI.java:55) ~[?:?]
        at com.mcrmb.iiiiiiIIiIiI.iiiiiiiiiiii(PlayerPointsHooker.java:38) ~[?:?]
        at com.mcrmb.iiiiiiIIiIII.run(PlayerPointsHooker.java:74) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_14_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:81) ~[Spigot-1.14.4.jar:git-Spigot-cbd1a1b-009d8af]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_14_R1.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:54) [Spigot-1.14.4.jar:git-Spigot-cbd1a1b-009d8af]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_251]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_251]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_251]
后台显示成功，然后又报错点券未到账

replies.author: 可爱和虎
replies.txt_content: 其实装一下最新版就能解决很多问题

replies.txt_content: 更新版本 修复问题
